Experience

Comvoy (Ario & Busonline)
Software Engineer | 2017 - 2018
Working together with an embedded engineer to develop Ario. Designing a scalable architecture to handle communication and firmware upgrades over mobile connections for this system.

Hiring, managing and assisting a remote team during development of frontend and backend for visualisation and management of the data for this system.

2dotstwice
Backend & frontend developer | 2015 - 2017
Working in an excellent self-managing agile team to develop big projects for customers such as cultuurnet.

The Safe Group
Backend & frontend developer | 2014 - 2016
Development of custom stock system for use during festivals such as Rock Werchter and Pukkelpop.

GroupTstudent
Full stack developer | 2012 - 2014
Sole developer of a flexible scheduling system to enable students to manage scheduling for their courses in an easier way.

Profile

I keep up to date with the latest and greatest in technology and the software development world by:

  • following up daily the latest news trough ycombinator
  • while commuting listening to podcasts such as a16z, The Changelog, Test & Code...
  • during dinner watching technical talks or other relevant topics

On the over-social side in general, and therefor:

  • Go to and help organise meetups such as PHPLeuven, Pebble
  • Visit conferences such as FOSDEM, arrrrcamp...
  • Talk at meetups
  • Give trainings to groups and individuals

Just generally love technology.
Run a decent network at home and server for internal and external use.
Use a Raspberry PI for alarm clock, media center and carry one around.
If something is broken I either fix it, or take it apart to see how it ticks.
